alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 11:54AM EST until February 22 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. Power outages are possible * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures remain right at, or slightly below freezing. Travel impacts have not been reported. However, power outages are starting to be reported in the region. Ice accretion is most likely on elevated surfaces such as powerlines, trees, and bride decks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
